document.heading: Title IX Athletic Equity Act of 2015

history.narrative: Law 21-29, the “Title IX Athletic Equity Act of 2015,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 21-31. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 30, 2015, and July 14, 2015, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 31, 2015, it was assigned Act No. 21-141 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 21-29 became effective October 21, 2015.
